name: Bombfield (Alpha 1.0)
description:
- Bombfield is a Micro Arcade Game where you must escape a 30 level dungeon infested with active high-tech teleporting bombs and other hazards, like crushing walls, turrets and hidden darts. Don't let the word "micro" fool you though, because although a full playthrough is 30 levels, Bombfield (will be) packed with over 100+ fully featured levels for the system to randomly choose from, so your experience is different every time!

Bombfield features a whopping 4x4 pixel graphic tile-set, bleeps and bloops for ear-crunching sound effects, and 3 average yet pleasant color shades to experience.

OBJECTIVES:

- Collect all orbs in a room to proceed to next level.

- Escape all 30 levels to survive Bombfield!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys: 4 directional movement.

X: Menu Select.

X + Arrow Key: Disarm Bombs, Collect Orbs.

Escape: Main Menu, Close Game.
